original_text: It seems to you that you are in the dark and you cannot see. You feel as if a flood of deep water covers you. It seems to you that you are in the dark
korean_text: 어둠이 너로 하여금 보지 못하게 하고 홍수가 너를 덮느니라

sentences.original_text: It seems to you that you are in the dark
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 어둠 속에 있는 것 같습니다

sentences.original_text: You feel as if a flood of deep water covers you
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 깊은 물의 홍수가 당신을 덮는 것처럼 느낍니다

sentences.original_text: It seems to you that you are in the dark
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 어둠 속에 있는 것 같습니다
